channel.title: checkmirrors
channel.description: York driving instructors, checkmirrors, is a School of Motoring based in York with over 14 years experience. Book today from just £30 per hour or £285 for 10 lessons. We also have Pass Plus options available in York from £220.

item.title: Congratulations to Adam Welsh, York who passed yesterday first time with only 4 minors.
item.description: “Thanks to Rob from Checkmirrors I passed first time with only 4 minors. Rob is a great driving instructor, easy to get along with, I’d definitely recommend. Thanks again Rob”

item.title: Congratulations to Luke Swainsbury who passed with Rob
item.description: “Passed first time, massive thank you to Rob at Checkmirrors for all the time and effort you put into me, extremely recommend. Thanks again”

item.title: Congratulations to Beth Loseby, York who passed with Rob.
item.description: “Couldn’t recommend Rob from Checkmirrors driving school enough, after struggling with driving for months before taking lessons with him, I noticed a change straight away and passed first time!”

item.title: Congratulations Kylie from Tadcaster who passed with Rob
item.description: “I enjoyed my driving lessons with Rob. I had another driving instructor before him and rob was so much better because at the end of every lesson he would give me a debrief on how it went what I need to practice next. But he never made me feel bad about my driving. So I would definitely recommend him to others.”

item.title: Congratulations to Bridie Murray from York, Passed second time with only 6 minors
item.description: “Sarah has been fantastic. After going through at least 5 other different instructors, I instantly knew Sarah was a keeper! Would 100% recommend, lessons were fun and stress free. Sarah was very good at keeping me calm as I was a nervous driver.”

item.title: Congratulations Keira Hall who passed with Rob on the 7th Febuary
item.description: “Definitely would recommend Rob from checkmirrors driving school. Found him very helpful and patient. Thanks again Rob “

item.title: Congratulations to Andrew Mirelman who passed with Sarah. First time with only 3 x minors.
item.description: “Thanks for the great instruction! Rob & Sarah are very professional and friendly. They know how to prepare you for the test and really made this a tailored experience. I’m an experienced driver from another country and this really helped me pass the UK practical”

item.title: Congratulations to Mariam Musa, Harehills, Leeds, who passed with Nick.
item.description: “Hi Nick. once again, just wanted to say thank you so much for sticking with me. Finally passed today and I will not forget how much you helped me! I could not wish for a better instructor. Please say thank you to Heidi for me as well, she is the best diary keeper, best wishes for the future, and I will be sure to always recommend checkmirrors!”

item.title: Congratulations to Nathan Van Hese who passed with Rob.
item.description: “Would definitely recommend Rob - always helpful and informative. Is keen on progressing you and always patient. Thanks again.”

item.title: Congratulations to Sophie Coulthard who passed first time with Sarah.
item.description: “Driving with Sarah made learning to drive both a fun and calm experience. From coming from another instructor after months of driving with hardly any improvement, Sarah helped build my confidence and enabled me to see improvement week on week so that in 4 months I went from not been able to start without stalling, to passing my test. Overall a great experience, with lessons being structured and well planned In advance”
